RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

ObjPathId.description: ID of the path that the object will move along on.

StartDist.description: Starting point of the object movement.

EndDist.description: Ending point of the object's movement.

MoveSpeed.description: Speed of the movement they will travel at.

PointLight.description: Light type that they should create.
